Text: RE Aruba Cc KimKim and Melissa The cost of your trip insurance was actually each They still refuse to refund it and the agent I just spoke with was very nice to see if they could reaccomodate you in any way on the days you originally requested She cannot so suggests writing to customer service about the trip insurance refund This is who I spoke with however I will get a name address and phone number of someone higher Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday September PM To Cc Subject RE Aruba I disagree with them We bought a particular product and they wanted to change it by either making us pay more money and spend more time flying or making us take two more vacation days that we dont have which us paying more money by not getting paid at work We loved that trip and would still take what we originally agreed to I dont see how they can subject us to penalties for something we had not originally agreed to Original Message From Dee Espinoza ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESDeeEspinozaCdeeEespinozatravelparkEcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday September PM To Ward Kim S Houston Cc Olinger Kimberly S Subject RE Aruba Yes They called this morning They will refund all but the trip cancellation insurance which was each They said that you would have been in cancellation penalties if you did not have the insurance that would have amounted to much more so I have cancelled it I do not know how long it will be before it appears as a credit on your card It depends on your billing cycle It may take cycles Refunds normally take longer than charges but they are in the process Regards Dee Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday September PM To Subject RE Aruba Dee Have you heard any thing yet Thanks Kim Original Message From Dee Espinoza ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESDeeEspinozaCdeeEespinozatravelparkEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday September AM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject RE Aruba Kim I have left a message for my sales rep now She is in Puerto Vallarta with a group but will be back tomorrow This may be where the supervisor is also Ill call in a minute to see if I can get help elsewhere I apologize for such a delay Dee Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax Original Message From mailto Sent Monday September PM To Subject RE Aruba Dee Any word from the Manager Kim Original Message From Dee Espinoza ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESDeeEspinozaCdeeEespinozatravelparkEcomE NRONcom Sent Friday September PM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject Aruba Kim I have left a message for the Customer Relations manager to call me When I got in this morning they had faxed me an alternate using Delta for around I checked air only in case we could drop the air with Continental Vacations but it is between and each Ill let you know what happens when I speak with the mgr Dee Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the FerryKim The info I have on the ferry is this It is not much more expensive to have a deluxe cabin Since one never knows about Italian accomodations I would go with it It is the old ferry boat that goes this route on Oct Departs at pm and arrives at am on the th The deluxe cabin is ITL each approx USD It is not clear but it seems that the reservations fee is ITL about USD While the cabin rate is per person the res fee is per cabin I believe The regular cabin is each and res The car rate is and res fee is Now I am guessing on this as their is no clear explanation It could be that there is a discount if you make a res ahead of time ie for prior res and if you show up at departure time Same as passengercabin fee It may mean with prior res or if you show up Ill let you know when I receive an answer It may be next week as I just emailed the request this morning Regards Dee Deee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax

FW FerryKim Here is the reply I have received from the ferry company Each deluxe cabin with a car and overnighting tickets by mail will cost ITL approx USD The deluxe cabin only with ovenight mail is ITL approx USD Ill wait to hear from you Monday Regards Dee Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax Original Message From Dee Espinoza Sent Thursday September PM To Subject Ferry Kim The info I have on the ferry is this It is not much more expensive to have a deluxe cabin Since one never knows about Italian accomodations I would go with it It is the old ferry boat that goes this route on Oct Departs at pm and arrives at am on the th The deluxe cabin is ITL each approx USD It is not clear but it seems that the reservations fee is ITL about USD While the cabin rate is per person the res fee is per cabin I believe The regular cabin is each and res The car rate is and res fee is Now I am guessing on this as their is no clear explanation It could be that there is a discount if you make a res ahead of time ie for prior res and if you show up at departure time Same as passengercabin fee It may mean with prior res or if you show up Ill let you know when I receive an answer It may be next week as I just emailed the request this morning Regards Dee Deee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax
ItalyKim I am sorry that it is taking me so long to get back to you I will call you tomorrow Dee Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax

FerryI have found a ferry that appears to be the shortestcheapest but still have more investigating to do If you go drive from Palermo down to Messina you can cross to Villa San Giovanni About km hrs There are ferries every minutes The cost depends on the size of the car but is anywhere from to ITL That is USD to USD That would make your drive farther You can find the crossing at the narrowest strait between Sicily and the mainland near Reggio di Calabria Im working on hotels now Then the cars Dee Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax

Italy car and ferryI have Alamo full size dr passenger cars reserved for you We do not have to prepay The allinclusive rate is ITL approx for the days This includes collision and theft insurance taxes and unlimited mileage I think that this is very good car booked under John Watson and under Dennis Dye They are manuals The ferry from Palermo to Naples is daily departing at pm arriving am It looks as though the vehicles will cost between and each The passengers in a double outside cabin are to I believe per passenger The ferry from Palermo to Livorno departs at pm and arrives the next day about pm The double outside suite is The coach seat is Each car is to I need to verify if the cabin rate includes the passenger fee I had found a ferry to Salerno but it only operates day a week not the day you need Ill get back to you Dee Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax

ferriesThe ferry companies were not receiving requests yesterday or today due to a bank holiday I need your home address and phone number for the request You are not committed until I get a reply from them and then fax your credit cards Can you also get me the credit card numbers I will not use them until I check back with you about final costs Thanks Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax

ferriesKim By italian maritime law I must have everyones passport names and ages With the credit card nbrs I will need exp date and cardholder name address and phone Thanks Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax

passport numbers and namesCan you send them to me in a reply to this email I hope you had a good trip to Mexico Where did you go there Thanks Dee Dee Espinoza Travel Agency in the Park Lamar ste Houston Tx direct line fax
